text: Dimaadua ga helekai gi Samuel, “Gu waalooloo behee do lodo huaidu gi Saul? Au guu daa a mee gi daha mo dono waawa king o Israel. Hana, kae ina dau lolo olib, gei Au ga hagau goe gi Bethlehem gi baahi taane dono ingoo go Jesse, idimaa, Au gu hilihili dagu dangada i nia dama a maa belee hai di king.”
